channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: End Racial Gerrymandering
item.description: The Supreme Court has a golden opportunity in Louisiana v. Callais to end racial gerrymanders.

item.title: JD Vance dismisses bipartisan outrage over racist and offensive Young Republican group chat
item.description: The public release of a Young Republican group chat that included racist language, jokes about rape and flippant commentary on gas chambers prompted b...

item.title: Exclusive: Anti-Vance Pentagon Official Pushes For DEI ‘Acolyte’ To Assume Top Army Post
item.description: 'People at the White House are pissed. People throughout the Department [of War] are pissed,' a senior Army official told The Federalist.

item.title: The NYT Is Angry That Trump’s Reported Refugee Reform Puts America First
item.description: There is nothing racist about wanting immigrants who speak English, and can learn 'American history and values' and 'respect for cultural norms' to be...

item.title: Ready for Your Close-Up? Not If You’re the Wrong Race
item.description: Ethnic gatekeeping in the arts doesn’t remove barriers — it erects them.

item.title: Democratic hopeful for California governor open to transgender athletes in Olympics
item.description: Betty Yee, a Democratic candidate in the primary race for California governor, didn't say "no" when asked whether biological males who identify as fem...

item.title: A Critic Takes the White House Tour
item.description: It’s the time when the White House is the People’s House and history is most palpable, thanks to Mrs. Kennedy. But, alas, the tours are now canceled t...

item.title: Dems Make A Mockery Of The Word ‘Temporary’ By Pushing For Extension Of Biden Covid Credits
item.description: The political hill that Democrats are dying on would lock in expanded Obamacare subsidies, costing taxpayers hundreds of billions of dollars.

item.title: Small Business Needs Permanent Regulatory Relief, Too
item.description: Congress and President Trump must act quickly to give 32 million small businesses permanent relief from a painful and pointless government mandate.

item.title: Top Sociological Journal Says Young Kids Should Be Sexualized And It’s Colonizers’ Fault They Aren’t
item.description: This academic article, and any like it, must go down, as its clear objective is to violate children.

item.title: WATCH: Susan Ferrechio answers questions about Trump's role in Middle East peace
item.description: After two years of ravaging war and global tension, a new era of peace may be on the horizon in the Middle East.

item.title: Al Jazeera Remains a Leopard That Can’t Change Its Spots
item.description: Despite talk of moderation, the network has continued to broadcast a distortion of reality.

item.title: Why Most Latin Pop Stars Like Bad Bunny Are Crazy Leftists
item.description: As enjoyable and catchy as Latin music is, music is never just about art and self-expression.

item.title: Supreme Court case could lead to loss of Black representation in Congress, but the scope is unknown
item.description: A neutering by the Supreme Court of the Voting Rights Act's last remaining major provision would potentially trigger a political avalanche - an event ...

item.title: Trump touts effects of FBI 'Operation Summer Heat' crackdown
